text: The women's long jump event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 16 and 17 July. ==Medalists== {| ==Participation== According to an unofficial count, 22 athletes from 17 countries participated in the event. ==References== Long jump Category:Long jump at the World Athletics U20 Championships
title: 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Women's long jump
